Utility Edition | November 18, 2014
Confidential & Proprietary
BEACON® AMA Starter Kits: November 2014 Update
Continued great work by the sales team and channel partners for the last couple of weeks! Since our last update, 11 starter kits have been sold, bringing the total to 188 BEACON AMA starter kits deployed in the United States!
As a reminder, customers who are interested in deploying a BEACON Advanced Metering Analytics (AMA) starter kit with more than the standard amount of ORION® Cellular endpoints may work with their sales representative to discuss pricing for an expanded starter kit.
BEACON AMA Starter Kit Sales:
11/4/2014 - 11/18/2014
Please contact Cindy Kransler if you have any questions.
New White Paper: How the Cloud is Revolutionizing the Future of Water Utility Management
The new white paper, "How the Cloud is Revolutionizing the Future of Water Utility Management" has been released and is available through the Badger Meter internet, extranet or Literature Order Form.
The white paper helps utility professionals understand the differences between managed cloud-based software solutions and traditional in-house solutions for water data management.
Download the white paper on the Badger Meter internet, extranet or order it from the Literature Order Form.
Please contact Dan Merritt if you have any questions.
New BEACON AMA Print Ad
To continue promoting BEACON AMA in media publications, a new informational print ad has been developed and will begin circulating in 2015. The new ad highlights the important selling features of BEACON AMA and emphasizes how utilities can use the managed solution to optimize their operations. Look for the new ad in water management publications throughout 2015.
Documentation Updates
